AppTitle: 茂林源記：機械擴展小幫手
LederPlug: 請從Leder Games官方網站購買機械擴展！

BotSetup.PriorityMarkers: 放置優先級標記在地圖上
BotSetup.TurmoilText: You fall into Turmoil if you cannot place a roost.
BotSetup.TurmoilNobilityText: You fall into Turmoil if you cannot place a roost or warrior.

Electric Eyrie.Setup0: Form a supply of 20 warriors near you.
Electric Eyrie.Setup1: Place 1 roost and 6 warriors in the corner clearing diagonally opposite from the clearing with the keep token. If the Marquise is not playing, place those pieces in a random corner clearing.
Electric Eyrie.Setup3: Collect your remaining 6 roost buildings and place them near you.

Vagabot.Setup0: Place the Vagabot pawn in the forest adjacent to the most clearings. If there are multiple such forests, decide randomly among those.
Vagabot.Setup1: Shuffle the quest deck, draw 1 quest card, and place it face up near you. This quest can only be completed by the bot.
Vagabot.Setup2: Place any 1 item marked "R" beneath each ruin on the map.
Vagabot.Setup3: Take any 4 items marked "S" and place them in your Satchel. _(The Tinker starts with 3 items instead of 4 items.)_

Automated Alliance.Setup0: Form a supply of 10 warriors near you.
Automated Alliance.Setup1: Collect your 3 bases and place them near you.
Automated Alliance.Setup2: Collect your 10 sympathy tokens and place them near you.

Mechanical Marquise.Setup0: 拿取25個士兵，放在版圖旁邊，作為你的供應堆。
Mechanical Marquise.Setup1: 將城堡放置在地圖上一個隨機的角落領地。
Mechanical Marquise.Setup2: 除了與城堡領地斜對角的角落領地外，在其他每個領地各放置1個士兵。 在城堡領地放置1個額外的士兵。 _(總共放置12個士兵。)_
Mechanical Marquise.Setup3: 隨機放置1個鋸木廠、1個工坊、1個徵兵所在與城堡領地相鄰的領地中，每個領地放置至多1個建築。
Mechanical Marquise.Setup4: 將剩餘的15個建築放在陣營版圖對應的建築條上。

Electric Eyrie.Easy: During setup, add only one Loyal Vizier to the Decree.
Electric Eyrie.Challenging: During setup, take one bird Ambush from the deck and add it to the bird column of the Decree.
Electric Eyrie.Nightmare: During setup, take one bird Ambush from the deck and add it to the bird column of the Decree. At the end of Evening, score one victory point.

Vagabot.Easy: In evening, refresh one fewer item.
Vagabot.Challenging: In evening, refresh one more item.
Vagabot.Nightmare: In evening, refresh one more item. At the end of Evening, score one victory point.

Automated Alliance.Easy: You only **Organize** if a clearing has four or more Alliance warriors.
Automated Alliance.Challenging: You **Organize** if a clearing has two or more Alliance warriors.
Automated Alliance.Nightmare: You **Organize** if a clearing has two or more Alliance warriors. At the end of Evening, score one victory point.

Mechanical Marquise.Easy: 當你**招募**時，僅放置2個士兵。
Mechanical Marquise.Challenging: 當你**招募**時，也在你所控制的。與計畫牌類型相同，且最高優先級的領地中放置2個士兵。
Mechanical Marquise.Nightmare: 當你**招募**時，也在你所控制的。與計畫牌類型相同，且最高優先級的領地中放置2個士兵。 在夜晚結束時，你獲得**vp:1**。

Electric Eyrie (DC).Easy: Whenever you **Recruit** for bird, instead place one fewer warrior.
Electric Eyrie (DC).Challenging: Whenever you **Recruit** for bird, instead place one more warrior.
Electric Eyrie (DC).Nightmare: Whenever you **Recruit** for bird, instead place one more warrior. At the end of Evening, score one victory point per two players (rounded up).

Vagabot (DC).Easy: In evening, refresh one fewer item.
Vagabot (DC).Challenging: In evening, refresh one more item.
Vagabot (DC).Nightmare: In evening, refresh one more item. At the end of Evening, score one victory point per two players (rounded up).

Automated Alliance (DC).Easy: You only **Organize** if a clearing has four or more Alliance warriors.
Automated Alliance (DC).Challenging: You **Organize** if a clearing has two or more Alliance warriors.
Automated Alliance (DC).Nightmare: You **Organize** if a clearing has two or more Alliance warriors. At the end of Evening, score one victory point per two players (rounded up).

Mechanical Marquise (DC).Easy: 當你**招募**時，僅放置3個士兵。
Mechanical Marquise (DC).Challenging: 當你**招募**時，放置5個士兵。
Mechanical Marquise (DC).Nightmare: 你**招募**時，放置5個士兵。在夜晚結束時，場上每兩個玩家(向上取整)，你獲得**vp:1**。

SpecificRules.TextPoorManualDexterity: 你沒有手牌，也無法棄牌。如果玩家要從你這抽牌，改為從牌堆抽取一張卡牌。如果玩家要將卡牌給你，改為丟棄那張牌，然後你獲得**vp:1**。
SpecificRules.TextHatesSurprises: 玩家不能對你打出奇襲牌。
SpecificRules.TextLordsOfTheForest: You rule any clearings where you are tied in presence.
SpecificRules.TextNobility: You now fall into turmoil if you cannot place a roost or a warrior. Whenever you fall into turmoil, you do not lose victory points. Instead, you score one victory point per bird card in the Decree.
SpecificRules.TextRelentless: After resolving the Decree, remove all defenseless buildings and tokens in any clearing with Eyrie warriors.
SpecificRules.TextSwoop: At the end of Daylight, place two warriors in the clearing of highest priority with no Eyrie pieces.
SpecificRules.TextWarTax: Whenever you remove an enemy building or token, its owner loses one victory point.
SpecificRules.TextLoneWanderer: Your pawn is not a warrior and cannot be removed from the map.
SpecificRules.TextNimble: You can move regardless of who rules your clearing.
SpecificRules.TextAdventurer:
You can **Battle** no more than once per turn.
At the end of Daylight, repeat **Quest** as many times as possible.
SpecificRules.TextBerserker:
Whenever you **Battle**, instead move to the nearest clearing with the most pieces and target the player with the most pieces there.
In evening, repair one more item.
SpecificRules.TextHelper: Whenever you **Aid**, score one extra victory point, and the aided player draws two cards instead of one.
SpecificRules.TextHelperDC: Whenever you **Aid**, if there are no available items, move to aid the player with the lowest score, and exhaust one item to score **vp:1**. The aided player draws one card.
SpecificRules.TextMarksman: At the start of battle as attacker, deal an immediate hit _(scoring a point if you remove an enemy warrior)_.
SpecificRules.TextAutomatedAmbush: In battle as defender with any Alliance warriors, you deal an extra hit.
SpecificRules.TextAutomatedOutrage: Whenever a human removes a sympathy token or moves any warriors into a sympathetic clearing, they must discard a matching card. If they cannot, you score **vp:1**.
SpecificRules.TextMartialLaw: Whenever you place a sympathy token in a clearing with three or more warriors of an enemy player, you score one fewer victory point _(minimum of zero)_.
SpecificRules.TextCrackdown: Whenever a base is removed, remove all sympathy tokens from clearings matching the suit of the base removed.
SpecificRules.TextCrackdownDC: Whenever a base is removed, return all sympathy tokens from clearings matching the suit of the base removed.
SpecificRules.TextInformants: Defenseless sympathy tokens benefit from Automated Ambush.
SpecificRules.TextPopularity: Enemies do not score victory points for removing sympathy tokens.
SpecificRules.TextPopularityDC: Enemies can only score one victory point per turn for removing your sympathy tokens.
SpecificRules.TextVeterans: Gain the Guerilla Warfare ability of the Woodland Alliance. _(In battle as defender, you use the higher roll and the attacker uses the lower roll.)_
SpecificRules.TextVeteransDC: In battle as defender, use the same die result as the attacker. _(Both players use the higher die to determine hits rolled.)_
SpecificRules.TextWildfire: At the end of evening, **Spread Sympathy**. Do not score points for placing this sympathy token.
SpecificRules.TextTheKeep: 只有你能在城堡領地中放置配件。
SpecificRules.TextBlitz: After you move, find the clearing you rule of the highest priority without any enemy pieces. Move all but one warrior from the clearing. Then, battle in the destination clearing.
SpecificRules.TextFortified: 你的建築必須受到兩點傷害才會被移除。建築若只受到一點傷害則無視傷害。
SpecificRules.TextHospitals: 作為防禦方在戰鬥結束時，若2個或以上的貴族士兵在戰鬥中被移除，放置2名士兵在城堡領地中。
SpecificRules.TextHospitalsDC: 作為防禦方在戰鬥結束時，若2個或以上的貴族士兵在戰鬥中被移除，放置1名士兵在城堡領地中。
SpecificRules.TextIronWill: 當你在**升級白天**時**招募**，放置兩倍數量的士兵。
SpecificRules.TextIronWillDC: **重複白天** 每回合可以發生兩次而非只有一次。

Electric Eyrie.Recruit:
Recruit {{totalForSuit}} warrior(s) in a {{suitText}} clearing with a roost. {{recruitText}}
_(**Ties**: Recruit in such a clearing with the most enemy pieces, then fewest Eyrie warriors, then lowest priority.)_
Electric Eyrie.Move:
Move from the {{suitText}} clearing you rule with the most of your warriors to an adjacent clearing. Leave enough warriors to exactly rule the origin clearing or {{totalForSuit}}, whichever is higher.
_(**Destination Ties**: Move to such a clearing with no roost, then fewest enemy pieces, then lowest priority.)_
Electric Eyrie.Battle:
Battle in a {{suitText}} clearing against the player with the most buildings there. {{extraHit}}
_(**Clearing Ties**: Battle in such a clearing with no roost, then most defenseless buildings, then lowest priority.)_
_(**Defender Ties**: Battle such a player with the most pieces there, then the player with the most victory points.)_
Electric Eyrie.ExtraDecree: You should have added at least 2 bird cards to the decree.
Electric Eyrie.ExtraRelentless: Remove all defenseless tokens and buildings in any clearing with Eyrie warriors.
Electric Eyrie.ExtraRecruit: If you cannot place a warrior, you fall into turmoil.
Electric Eyrie.ExtraBuild: Place a roost in the clearing you rule of highest priority with no roost. If you cannot place a roost, you fall into turmoil.
Electric Eyrie.ExtraSwoop: Place two warriors in the clearing of highest priority with no Eyrie pieces.

Vagabot.ActionExplore: Move to the nearest ruin, exhausting one item per move, then exhaust one item to take an item from that ruin.
Vagabot.ActionQuest: Move to the nearest clearing matching the quest, then exhaust any two items to discard the quest and score **vp:1**. _(Ignore card text.)_ Then, replace the quest.
Vagabot.ActionQuestRepeat: Repeat this as many times as possible.
Vagabot.ActionAid: Target the player in your clearing with any items and the least VP among those players. Exhaust as many items as possible up to the number of items they have, take that many items from them, and score {{aidHelpText}}that many VP. Then, they draw {{aidHelpText}}that many cards.
Vagabot.ActionBattle: Move to the nearest clearing with any pieces of the enemy with the most {{target}}, then exhaust one item to battle that player. Score **vp:1** per enemy warrior removed.
Vagabot.ActionBattleAdventurer: Repeat this action, exhausting two items per extra battle, as many times as possible.
Vagabot.ActionBattleMarksman: Deal an immediate hit in each battle.
Vagabot.ActionBattleTiebreaker: _(If target defender is in multiple clearings at equal distance, move to clearing where they have most buildings and tokens, then fewest warriors.)_
Vagabot.ActionRepair: If you have any damaged items, exhaust one item to repair one damaged item, unexhausted before exhausted.
Vagabot.ActionSpecial: Exhaust one item to do the following (skip if it would have no effect):

Automated Alliance.Sympathy:
Place a sympathy token in the **card:{{suit}}** clearing with the fewest enemy warriors adjacent to any sympathetic clearing.
(**No Such Clearings**: Instead place a sympathy token on the clearing with the fewest enemy pieces.)
(**Cannot Spread**: If you cannot place a sympathy token, score 5 VP.)
Automated Alliance.Revolt: Remove all enemy pieces from any sympathetic clearing with the most enemy pieces, and place the corresponding base there.

Mechanical Marquise.Blitz: Find the clearing you rule of the highest priority without any enemy pieces. Move all but one warrior from the clearing. Then, battle in the destination clearing.
Mechanical Marquise.Bird0: 在所有領地中戰鬥。_(防禦方為在該領地中有最多配件的玩家，其次為分數最高者。)_
Mechanical Marquise.Bird1: Recruit {{warriorsOverTwo}} warrior(s) in each of the two clearings you rule with lowest priority. If you only rule one clearing, place all {{totalWarriors}} warriors there.
Mechanical Marquise.Bird2:
Build a building of the type with the most pieces on the map in a clearing you rule with the most Marquise Warriors.
_(On a tie between sawmills and any other building types, place a sawmill. On a tie between workshops and recruiters but not sawmills, place a recruiter.)_
Mechanical Marquise.Bird3: Move all but three of your warriors from each clearing to the adjacent clearing with the most enemy pieces. Then battle in each clearing you moved into.
Mechanical Marquise.BirdChallenging: Place two warriors in the ordered clearing you rule of the highest priority.
Mechanical Marquise.Suit0: 在每個**card:{{suit}}**領地中戰鬥。_(防禦方為在該領地中有最多配件的玩家，其次為分數最高者。)_
Mechanical Marquise.Suit1: Recruit {{totalWarriors}} warriors evenly spread across **card:{{suit}}** clearings you rule. If there are extra warriors that cannot be placed evenly in **card:{{suit}}** clearings, place the last warrior in the **card:{{suit}}** clearing with the highest priority.
Mechanical Marquise.Suit2: Build a **building:{{building}}** in a clearing you rule with the most Marquise warriors.
Mechanical Marquise.Suit3: Move all but three of your warriors from each **card:{{suit}}** clearing to the adjacent clearing with the most enemy pieces.
Mechanical Marquise.Repeat: If you did not place a building this turn and have five or fewer buildings on the map, discard the order card, draw a new one, and repeat Daylight.

Automated Alliance (DC).Sympathy:

Place a sympathy token into an unsympathetic adjacent clearing adjacent to any sympathetic clearing.
(**Clearing Tie**: Place into the lowest priority clearing.)
(**Cannot Spread**: If you cannot place a sympathy token, score 5 VP.)

Recruit {{totalWarriors}} warriors evenly spread across **card:{{suit}}** clearings you rule. Score **vp:1** for every two warriors that could not be recruited.

Mechanical Marquise (DC).Suit3: Move all but three of your warriors from each **card:{{suit}}** clearing to the adjacent clearing with the most enemy pieces. Each warrior may only move once during this action.

Vagabot.Refresh: If you have any damaged items, refresh {{itemRefreshMin}} undamaged items. If you have none, refresh {{itemRefreshMax}} instead.
Vagabot.Forest: If you are in a forest, repair all items. If not, repair {{itemRepairs}} item(s). Repair unexhausted items before exhausted items.

Automated Alliance.WarriorPlace: Place a warrior in each clearing with a base.
Automated Alliance.Wildfire: **Spread Sympathy**, but do not score victory points.

Electric Eyrie (DC).NightmareScore: Score **vp:1** for every two players (rounded up).

Mechanical Marquise (DC).Repeat: 如果你本回合沒有放置任何建築，而且將會獲得少於3分，則丟棄計畫牌，抽取一張新的計畫牌並重複白天。每回合只能發生一次。
Mechanical Marquise (DC).RepeatIronWill: 如果你本回合沒有放置任何建築，而且地圖上只有五個或是更少的建築，則丟棄計畫牌，抽取一張新的計畫牌並重複白天。每回合只能發生兩次。
Mechanical Marquise (DC).NightmareScore: 場上每兩個玩家(向上取整)，你獲得**vp:1**。

Electric Eyrie.NoNobility: Lose one victory point per bird card in the Decree.

Vagabot.DescTinker: Search the discard pile for the top card with an available item and craft it, scoring **vp:1**. _Start the game with one fewer item._
Vagabot.SpecialTinker: Search the discard pile for the top card with an available item and craft it, scoring **vp:1**.
Vagabot.DescThief: Take a random card from the enemy in your clearing with most points there, then most pieces there.
